name: QLINDO
description: What is the project about? A gateway to green real estate through the Qlindo token What makes your project unique? Our business model, which is a distribution of a green real estate investment portfolio to all Qlindo holders. History of your project. A successful ICO, collaboration with TechWoodHomes (an Austrian real estate company) and a strong social media presence. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Acquiring more green real estate through further collaborations, in addition to deploying extensive social media marketing. What can your token be used for? In addition to price appreciation caused by the rise of green real estate, Qlindo token holders benefit from a utility reward program (bronze, silver and gold)
